Pittsburgh offers specialized antique appraisal services through established firms focusing on fine art, furniture, jewelry, and collectibles. Below is a curated list of local experts:

### **Kurt Shaw & Company**  
- **Specialties**: Fine art ($\text{19th–21st century}$), antiques ($\text{furniture}$), decorative arts ($\text{ceramics}$).

- **Services**: Insurance valuations ($\text{retail replacement}$), charitable donation documentation ($\text{fair market value + IRS Form 8283}$).  
- **Years Active**: 20+ years [$^2$].
